products.name: 8 Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gentle Foaming Cleanser
products.rationale: This gentle, hydrating cleanser is perfect for your combination skin. It effectively cleanses without stripping the skin's moisture barrier, thanks to its formula rich in various forms of hyaluronic acid. This ensures your skin is clean and comfortable, ready for the next steps.

am.instructions: Every morning, dispense a dime-sized amount into your wet hands and lather. Gently massage onto your face for 60 seconds, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water and pat dry.

products.name: Real Fit Vitamin C Serum
products.rationale: This serum contains pure Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), a powerful antioxidant that is highly effective for treating your concerns of pigmentation and sun spots. It will help to brighten your overall complexion and protect your skin from environmental damage during the day.

am.instructions: After cleansing, apply 2-3 drops to your dry face, avoiding the immediate eye area. Gently pat it into the skin until fully absorbed. Start by using this 3 times a week and increase to daily use if your skin tolerates it well.

products.name: Dive-In Low Molecule Hyaluronic Acid Toner
products.rationale: This toner will provide lightweight hydration to balance your combination skin. It features low-molecular-weight hyaluronic acid to penetrate deeply and hydrate from within, leaving your skin plump and prepped for the day without feeling heavy.

am.instructions: After your serum has absorbed, pour a quarter-sized amount into your palms and gently press it into your skin. You can also apply it with a cotton pad if you prefer. Layering it 2-3 times will provide extra hydration.

products.name: 8 Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gentle Foaming Cleanser
products.rationale: Using the same gentle cleanser from your morning routine ensures your skin is thoroughly cleansed without irritation. It removes daily grime and excess oil from the T-zone while maintaining hydration in drier areas.

pm.instructions: Every evening, dispense a dime-sized amount into your wet hands and lather. Gently massage onto your face for 60 seconds to remove impurities from the day. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water and pat dry.

products.name: No. 5 Vitamin Boosting Essential Toner
products.rationale: This is a multi-tasking toner that addresses both your pigmentation and pore concerns. It's packed with Niacinamide to help minimize the appearance of pores and a blend of potent brightening ingredients like Vitamin C derivatives and Arbutin to target dark spots and uneven skin tone.

pm.instructions: After cleansing, apply the toner to a cotton pad and gently sweep it across your face, or pour some into your hands and pat it in. This prepares your skin for the targeted treatments to follow.

products.name: Tone Brightening Capsule Ampoule
products.rationale: This targeted ampoule is your key weapon against pigmentation and under-eye darkening. It combines Niacinamide, Tranexamic Acid, and a stable form of Vitamin C to create a powerful brightening trio that fades dark spots and evens out your skin tone.

pm.instructions: Apply a full dropper of the ampoule to your face, paying special attention to the areas with pigmentation and the under-eye area. Gently pat until fully absorbed.

products.name: Dive-In Low Molecule Hyaluronic Acid Toner
products.rationale: Finishing with this hydrating toner helps to replenish any moisture lost and keeps your combination skin balanced. Its soothing and lightweight formula ensures your skin feels comfortable and hydrated without causing congestion.

pm.instructions: As the final step in your routine, pour a quarter-sized amount into your palms and gently press it into your skin. This will seal in the benefits of your treatment products and provide lasting hydration overnight.

products.name: Madagascar Centella Hyalu-Cica Brightening Toner
products.rationale: This toner contains Capryloyl Salicylic Acid (LHA), a very gentle exfoliant that will help to refine the texture of your skin and clear out pores, addressing your pore concerns. It also has Niacinamide for brightening and soothing Centella Asiatica, making it an ideal weekly treatment to boost your glow without irritation.

weekly.instructions: Once or twice a week in the evening, after cleansing, apply this toner with a cotton pad. Gently sweep it across your face, focusing on the T-zone where pores are most visible. Let it absorb, then follow with your ampoule and hydrating toner. Do not use on the same night as other strong exfoliants.

general_advice: Sunscreen is non-negotiable. Your routine focuses on treating pigmentation, but this will be ineffective without daily sun protection. Since no sunscreen was provided in the product list, it is crucial that you use a separate broad-spectrum sunscreen with at least SPF 30 every single morning and reapply every two hours if you are outdoors.
Consistency is your best friend. It can take at least 8-12 weeks of consistent use to see noticeable improvements in pigmentation and under-eye darkening. Stick with the routine to see results.

Introduce new active ingredients slowly. The Vitamin C serum is potent. Start by using it just 2-3 times per week in the morning, gradually increasing to daily use as your skin tolerates it to avoid irritation.

Listen to your skin. The structural component of your under-eye circles may not fully resolve with topical products alone. If this remains a significant concern after several months, consider consulting a dermatologist to discuss other available options.

Don't forget a moisturizer. While this routine provides excellent hydration through toners and ampoules, you would benefit from adding a dedicated moisturizer for combination skin at the end of your PM routine to lock everything in and support your skin barrier.
